song.title: Oceans (Where Feet May Fall)
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .Bm A/C# D A G
[1] .Bm A/C# D You call me out upon the waters . A G The great unknown where feet may fail || .Bm A/C# D And there I find You in the mystery . A G In oceans deep, my faith will stand
[C] .G D A And I will call upon Your name .G D A And keep my eyes above the waves || . G When oceans rise . D A My soul will rest in your embrace . G A Bm For I am Yours, and You are mine ||
[Interlude] .Bm A/C# D A Em/G
---
[2] .Bm A/C# D Your grace abounds in deepest waters . A G Your sovereign hand, will be my guide || .Bm A/C# D Where feet may fail and fear surrounds me . A G You've never failed and You won't start now
[Instrumental] .Bm A/C# D A Em/G .Bm G D A Bm G D A
[B] .Bm(G) G(D) Spirit lead me where my trust is without borders . D(A) A(Em) Let me walk upon the waters, wherever You would call me || .Bm(G) G(D) Take me deeper than my feet could ever wander . D(A) And my faith will be made stronger . A(Em) In the presence of my Saviour
song.presentation: 1 C 2 C B B B C
